quote: Now begins to rise in me the familiar rhythm; words that have lain dormant now lift, now toss their crests, and fall and rise, and falls again. I am a poet, yes. Surely I am a great poet.
quote_letters: NOW BEGINS TO RISE IN ME THE FAMILIAR RHYTHM WORDS THAT HAVE LAIN DORMANT NOW LIFT NOW TOSS THEIR CRESTS AND FALL AND RISE AND FALLS AGAIN I AM A POET YES SURELY I AM A GREAT POET
